definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Hester's first motion had been to cover her bosom with her clasped hands.
sentences.chinese: 海丝特的第一个动作就是想用合着的双手来捂住胸膛。

sentences.english: They timed their steps to the drumbeat.
Junebug skipping like a stone, with the headlights pointed at the dawn.
sentences.chinese: 六月的跳蚤像石头一样跳跃，合着指向黎明的头灯。

sentences.english: After the painless and eat Cephradine Capsules Metronidazole co eat?
sentences.chinese: 无痛人流后能吃头孢拉定胶囊和甲硝唑合着吃吗？

sentences.english: His long ears flopped up and down, keeping time with the jogging moting of his body.
sentences.chinese: 它的长耳朵一起一落，合着身体的慢跑动作。

sentences.english: The little book went up in the air and came down shut.
sentences.chinese: 那本小书被抛向空中，合着掉了下来。

sentences.english: Now let's read the text with the tape and fill in the following table.
sentences.chinese: 让我们合着朗读带跟读课文，然后完成表格。

sentences.english: Two hearts , two hearts that beat as one.
sentences.chinese: 两颗心合着一个节拍，这爱情青春常在。

sentences.english: The children hold their palms together reverentially to receive my offerings of candy.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们合着手掌，虔诚地接受着我分发的糖果。

definition: (interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
to echo one another/to respond (in agreement)
to look at/to see/to see (a doctor)/to visit
(onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
sorption (generic term for absorption, adsorption, diffusion, precipitation etc)
